thread.title: Thierry Henry shows he’s still a Gunner when asked about Spurs v Chelsea (Video)
thread.title_full: Thierry Henry shows he’s still a Gunner when asked about Spurs v Chelsea (Video)

author: Paul Morrissey
title: Thierry Henry shows he’s still a Gunner when asked about Spurs v Chelsea (Video)
text:
Thierry Henry shows he’s still a Gunner when asked about Spurs v Chelsea (Video) By Paul Morrissey   Thierry Henry, Arsenal legend 
As the club’s record goalscorer, Thierry Henry is more than simply an Arsenal legend; he’s one of the club’s greatest ever players. 
He always said he could never play for another club and was true to his word; despite finishing his career at Barcelona and New York Red Bulls, Arsenal remain his team. Who’s he up for between Spurs and Chelsea? 
With Chelsea running away with the title, some Arsenal fans will be reluctantly supporting hated London rivals Spurs tomorrow, as the lesser of two evils. 
Chelsea are running away with the title, and if they win tomorrow the title will basically be sewn up, so some Gooners will be willing Spurs to win and blow the title race open. 
But not Henry.
